QAPair.Question: Do you have information about 5-HIAA
QAPair.Answer: 5-HIAA is a urine test that measures the amount of 5-hydroxyindoleacetic acid (5-HIAA). 5-HIAA is a breakdown product of a hormone called serotonin. This test tells how much 5-HIAA the body is producing, which reflects how much serotonin is in the body.
